name: The Alchemist's Revolt
description:
You've made the discovery of a lifetime: the key to creating artificial life! You couldn't be more thrilled. Unfortunately, your neighbors do not feel the same.

Use your newfound discovery to create a swarm of helpers to fend off the angry mob, before they put a permanent stop to your research.

  • Collect your lost research notes!
  • Create adorable monsters!
  • Fight off your pesky neighbors!
